entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 1:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

Temperature: -7.0°C

Visibility: 17.7 km
Humidity: 87 %

Dewpoint: -8.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7 except low minus 11 in the Natuashish area.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7 except low minus 11 in the Natuashish area. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
